required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Real World Observational Study of Pembrolizumab for Chinese Advanced NSCLC
clinical_study.official_title: Real World Observational Study of Pembrolizumab for Chinese Advanced NSCLC

lead_sponsor.agency: First Affiliated Hospital of Zhejiang University

clinical_study.source: First Affiliated Hospital of Zhejiang University

brief_summary.textblock: This observational study is designed to assess the efficacy and safety of pembrolizumab for the treatment of Chinese advanced NSCLC.

detailed_description.textblock:
Pembrolizumab is a humanized antibody used in cancer immunotherapy.The NMPA(China) approved pembrolizumab for first-line treatment of certain patients with advanced NSCLC.
This is a multi-center non-interventional study, advanced NSCLC patients who treated with pembrolizumab and provide written informed consent will be included. The main objective of this study is to evaluate pembrolizumab efficacy and safety in the clinical practice and explore the prognosis-relevant factors of advanced NSCLC.

primary_outcome.measure: Median Overall survival (OS) since start of pembrolizumab
primary_outcome.description: OS was defined as the length of time from the administration of the first-dose until death from any cause.

primary_outcome.measure: Objective Response Rate (ORR) since start of pembrolizumab
primary_outcome.description: ORR was defined as the percentage of patients with complete response (CR) and partial response (PR) according to irRECIST.

primary_outcome.measure: Rate of Adverse Drug Reaction (ADR) since start of pembrolizumab
primary_outcome.time_frame: up to 3 months after the last dose
primary_outcome.description: Drug related AEs were evaluated using NCI-CTCAE v5.0

secondary_outcome.measure: Median Progression Free Survival (PFS) since start of pembrolizumab
secondary_outcome.description: PFS is defined as the time from the start of first-dose to first progression disease (PD) or death, whichever is earlier.

secondary_outcome.measure: Median Time To Treatment failure (TTF) since start of pembrolizumab
secondary_outcome.description: TTF is defined as the time from the start of first-dose to discontinuation for any reason, including disease progression, treatment toxicity, patient preference, or death.

arm_group.description: Patients with advanced non-small cell lung cancer treated with pembrolizumab

study_pop.textblock: Total 500 patients who receive pembrolizumab for advanced NSCLC will be enrolled. The patients should be registered consecutively in each site.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
1. Histologically or cytologically confirmed diagnosis of advanced or metastatic NSCLC
2. Patients who receive pembrolizumab for advanced NSCLC.
3. Patients who provided written informed consent.
Exclusion Criteria:
1.Patients who would join any interventional clinical studies from first diagnosis to the end of the pembrolizumab treatment

overall_official.affiliation: First Affiliated Hospital of Zhejiang University

facility.name: The First Affiliated Hospital of College of Medicine Zhejiang University
Second Affiliated Hospital, Zhejiang University of Medicine
Ningbo Medical Center Lihuili Eastern Hospital

patient_data.ipd_description: No plan to share date of the trial
